name: 25-Minute Focus Session
description: Complete one Pomodoro cycle with 5-minute break
instructions: Choose one specific topic or task to focus on
Remove all distractions (phone, social media, etc.)
Work with complete focus until timer ends
Take a 5-minute break - stand up, stretch, drink water
Mark task as complete to earn points
tips: If you get distracted, note it down and return to task
Use the break - don't skip it!
After 4 Pomodoros, take a longer 15-30 minute break

name: Flashcard Review Session
description: Review flashcards using active recall technique
instructions: Select a flashcard deck to review
Read the question/prompt on front of card
Try to recall the answer WITHOUT looking
Flip card to check your answer
Review 'Need review' cards again at end
tips: Don't peek at the answer too quickly
Saying answers out loud helps memory

name: Spaced Repetition Review
instructions: Check what topics you learned 1 day ago - review briefly
Check what topics you learned 3 days ago - review in more detail
Check what topics you learned 7 days ago - test yourself on these
Make notes on anything you've forgotten
Mark topics that need more review
tips: This technique fights the forgetting curve
Older topics should be harder to recall - that's normal
The act of struggling to remember strengthens memory
